description: In a landmark study, researchers from the University of Newcastle have identified over 4,300 koalas living in bushlands on Newcastle’s suburban fringe. Using thermal imaging and drone technology, the team mapped populations across 208 sites, including regions like Sugarloaf State Conservation Area, which had few previous records. The results show koalas are surviving in peri-urban landscapes, stressing the importance of preserving these environments. WWF-Australia praised the findings as vital for reaching its goal of doubling koala numbers by 2050 through accurate population monitoring.
title: Over 4,300 Koalas Found in Newcastle’s Fringe Forests by Drone Survey

description: Smartphones under Rs. 30,000 fall into the upper mid-range category and generally serve as entry points into the premium segment. They are an excellent value proposition, offering a good price to performance ratio. While the smartphones in our sub-Rs. 25,000 list are still great options to go for, it might be prudent to check our list of the top smartphones under Rs. 30,000 in India if you’re investing in a near-premium handset for the long term.
title: Top Smartphones Under Rs 30,000 in India (June 2025): Nothing Phone 3a Pro, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Poco X7 Pro

description: Zoom Communications expanded its Phone service in India to four more circles on Wednesday. With this expansion, Zoom Phone is now available in Mumbai, Delhi National Capital Region (NCR), Karnataka, and the Andhra Pradesh & Telangana telecom circles. It was previously available in two circles. Notably, the service is licenced by the Department of Telecommunications (DoT).
title: Zoom Expands Phone Service to Six Telecom Circles, Zoom Contact Centre Launched in India

description: Alappuzha Gymkhana is an exciting comedy-drama movie that follows a student who embarks on an unusual journey of boxing after failing his exams, only to get admission via sports quota. However, a lot is waiting for him as competition intensifies.
title: Alappuzha Gymkhana OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Comedy Drama Online?

description: Renee Ballard, portrayed by Maggie Q, is an LAPD Detective who has been assigned to a new cold case division. With fewer resources and intense murder cases, she identifies some shocking truths that involve her department. Watch this ravishing series, releasing soon on Prime Video.
title: Ballard OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Crime Thriller Series Online?

description: Celebrity chef Giada De Laurentiis is back with Giada In My Kitchen, a heartwarming new show streaming on June 23, 2025, on Prime Video, filled with flavour, family, and Mediterranean charm. This time, there are makeovers, recipes and stories coming directly to your home screens.
title: Giada In My Kitchen OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Giada De Laurentiis Makeover Special

description: NASA’s twin F-15 jets validated critical tools for the X-59 quiet supersonic aircraft, confirming precision systems like shock-sensing probes, schlieren imaging, and ALIGNS navigation during May flights over the Mojave Desert. The successful tests mark a key step in NASA’s Quesst mission, which aims to enable quieter, faster commercial air travel over land by replacing sonic booms with soft “thumps.”
title: NASA F-15 Flights Validate Supersonic Tools for X-59 Quiet Flight Quesst Mission

description: NASA’s Chandra telescope has spotted two powerful black hole jets from over 11.6 billion light-years away. Detected during the universe’s cosmic noon, these jets reveal rare high-speed behaviour boosted by Big Bang remnants. The findings, which factor in relativistic effects, shed new light on early black hole growth and will be published in The Astrophysical Journal.
title: NASA’s Chandra Spots Unexpectedly Strong Jet from Distant Black Hole at Cosmic Noon

description: India’s Axiom-4 space mission to the ISS has been delayed due to a liquid oxygen leak in the Falcon 9 booster. ISRO and SpaceX confirmed the postponement as engineers work to resolve the issue. The mission, featuring India’s first spacecraft pilot, Shubhanshu Shukla, includes global collaborators and over 60 scientific experiments.
title: Shubhanshu Shukla’s Axiom-4 Spaceflight Postponed Following Oxygen Leak in Falcon 9 Booster

description: Jessica, the main lead in the latest Netflix Rom-Com Series, is moving on from a heartbreak in her mid-thirties. She has taken a big step and moved to London to start afresh. There, she crosses paths with Felix, who is actually a red flag. Still, the two find themselves interacting with each other more. So, the emphasis of the series will be on whether an American girl and a British guy get along.
title: Too Much OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Upcoming Rom-Com Online?

description: French President Emmanuel Macron said he would push for European Union regulation to ban social media for children under the age of 15. This step is being proposed after a 31-year-old school aide was knifed during a bag search for weapons at a school in eastern France.
title: French President Emmanuel Macron to Push for Ban on Social Media for Under-15s After School Stabbing

description: Huawei Pura 80 series was launched in China on Wednesday. The Pro and Pro+ variants come with 1-inch 50-megapixel main rear cameras, while the Ultra version comes with a switchable telephoto camera system. They are currently available for purchase in the country. The price and availability details of the base variant have not yet been revealed. The Pura 80 has a 50-megapixel primary rear camera as well, although its sensor size is not known.
title: Huawei Pura 80 Ultra With Switchable Telephoto System Launched Alongside Pura 80, Pura 80 Pro and Pura 80 Pro+

description: Meta and TikTok have said that EU's supervisory fee levied on them was disproportionate and based on a flawed methodology. Meta told judges at the General Court it was not trying to avoid paying its fair share of the fee, but it questioned how the Commission had calculated the levy, saying it had been based on the revenue of the group rather than of the subsidiary.
title: Meta, TikTok Challenge Tech Fees in Second Highest EU Court

description: Mark Zuckerberg  is reportedly building a team to oversee Meta's initiatives around so-called "artificial general intelligence" (AGI). Zuckerberg is building the new AI team in tandem with a reported investment of over $10 billion (roughly Rs. 85,563 crore) in Scale AI
title: Meta's Zuckerberg Said to be Hiring for New 'Superintelligence' AI Team

description: MindsEye developer Build A Rocket Boy has said it is working on a patch to improve performance on PC and consoles after players reported severe technical issues at launch. The game received its day one patch on June 10 across PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X.
title: MindsEye Developer Says Its Working on Patch as Players Report Performance Issues, Bugs at Launch

description: OpenAI and Google have reportedly struck a deal which will let the former use the latter's cloud servers for computational needs. The deal was finalised after several months of discussions, the report mentioned. The financial terms of the deal are currently not known. Notably, ChatGPT suffered a major outage on Tuesday.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Planning to Use Google Cloud to Meet Computational Needs

description: South Korea's newly elected President, Lee Jae-myung plans to permit local companies to issue stablecoins in South Korea. The country is already a hotbed for crypto activity. More than a third of the population, or around 18 million people, participate in digital-asset markets.
title: South Korea’s Ruling Party Unveils Plan to Allow Stablecoins

description: Apple's first iOS 26 developer beta is already revealing unannounced details from WWDC 2025. Among the notable findings is a reference to a new AirPods Pro 3 model. Expected to launch in H2 2025, this AirPods Pro 3 model will succeed the AirPods Pro (2nd Generation), which was launched by Apple in September 2022.
title: AirPods Pro 3 Reportedly Mentioned in iOS 26 Beta 1 Code, Could Debut in H2 2025

description: Days Gone developer Bend Studio confirmed it was laying off employees. The studio will reportedly lay off 30 percent of its staff. The development comes after the studio's live service game was cancelled earlier this year.
title: Days Gone Developer Bend Studio Confirms Layoffs, 30 Percent of Staff Reportedly Impacted

description: Vadakkan, a paranormal investigator, flies from Heinski to Kerala to find the reason for the deaths of some people with an intersection to a TV show. He comes across mysterious islands where he shoots and confronts an entity from a Davidian cult practice. He finds an invisible power and the reason for so many deaths; the basis formed in this is that not many secrets can be hidden forever
title: Kishore-Starrer Vadakkan Now Streaming in Tamil and Telugu: Everything You Need to Know

description: Microsoft's June 2025 Patch Tuesday includes fixes for multiple security flaws. Among these are 11 "critical" and 56 "important" vulnerabilities. Two zero-day flaws were addressed, with one already actively exploited, as per the company. This follows Microsoft's fixes for Edge vulnerabilities, earlier this month, including a zero-day exploit.
title: Microsoft Fixes 67 Security Flaws With June 2025 Security Update, Including Two Zero-Day Vulnerabilities

description: Magistral, Mistral’s first-ever reasoning-focused large language models (LLMs), have been released. The Paris-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm has released two variants of Magistral — an open-source model named Small and an enterprise-focused model named Medium. Both feature multi-step reasoning and visible chain-of-thought (CoT). The open-source model can be downloaded via Hugging Face.
title: Mistral Releases Magistral, Its First-Ever Reasoning AI Models With Transparent Chain-of-Thought

description: Poco’s C71 offers a ton of features, given its price. Buyers will get a fingerprint reader, adaptive brightness, and a large 120Hz refresh rate display. While the given hardware will perform like an entry-level smartphone, there’s the looming competition slightly above this price point which makes this smartphone hard to recommend.
title: Poco C71 Review: For Those on Extra-Tight Budgets

description: Written and directed by Alvin Deva, Vaanil Thedinen is a romantic TV series that is currently streaming on AhaTamil. The series is a multi-starrer story of two couples who navigate their relationship bound by time. The series comprises four episodes and is a short romantic tale.
title: Vaanil Thedinen OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch the Tamil Series Online

description: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 is expected to launch in China soon, succeeding the original Mix Flip that debuted in July 2024. A senior Xiaomi executive has teased the arrival of the new clamshell foldable, which could launch alongside the Redmi K80 Ultra and Redmi’s rumoured gaming tablet. Meanwhile, leaks have also hinted at some of the key features the upcoming Mix Flip 2 might offer.
title: Xiaomi Mix Flip 2 Launch Teased; May Arrive Later This Month Alongside Redmi Gaming Tablet, K80 Ultra

description: BigBasket plans to roll out 10-minute food delivery services nationwide by the end of fiscal 2026. The Tata-backed grocery giant will take on established players such as Swiggy's Snacc, Blinkit's Bistro and Zepto Cafe, which already deliver coffee and ready-to-eat snacks in less than 15 minutes.
title: BigBasket to Launch 10-Minute Food Delivery Across India by March 2026, Executive Says

description: People who accused Google of illegally collecting their personal information cannot sue the Alphabet unit as a group in a class action, a US judge ruled. "Inquiries relating to Google's implied consent defense will overwhelm the damages claims for all causes of action," Rogers wrote.
title: Judge Rejects Class Action for Google Privacy Lawsuit

description: Slack recently blocked other software firms from searching or storing messages on its platform. Since the Salesforce change, Glean and other applications can no longer index, copy or store the data they access via the Slack API on a long-term basis.
title: Salesforce Said to Have Blocked AI Rivals from Using Slack Data

description: Subham, directed by Praveen Kandregula, also marks the directorial debut of Samantha Prabhu. It is a horror comedy movie featuring a married woman who gets possessed through a TV show at 9 PM. It is when their husbands form a band together to find the reason behind it.
title: Subham, Samantha Prabhu's Latest Horror Comedy to Premiere on Jio Hotstar

description: Musk has staked Tesla's future on self-driving vehicles, pivoting away from plans to build a cheaper EV platform, and much of the company's valuation hangs on that vision. The EV maker tentatively plans to begin offering rides on its self-driving robotaxis to the public on June 22.
title: Tesla's Public Robotaxi Rides Set for Tentative June 22 Start, CEO Elon Musk Says

description: Splatoon Raiders, a spinoff Splatoon game, is coming exclusively to Nintendo Switch 2. Nintendo also announced a free update for Splatoon 3 that updates the game's visuals and performance on Switch 2.
title: Nintendo Announces Splatoon Raiders Spinoff Title for Switch 2 Alongside Splatoon 3 Update

description: Oppo K13x 5G will be available in Midnight Violet and Sunset Peach colour options, the company has confirmed in a release. Oppo also teased that the phone will carry a dual rear camera unit, which will be arranged within a vertically placed elliptical camera module. It is set to go on sale in the country via Flipkart. The Oppo K13x 5G is reportedly set to launch in India in the last week of June.
title: Oppo K13x 5G Design, Colour Options Revealed; Tipped to Launch Later This Month

description: Snap Specs are set to launch next year as a consumer-focused version of Snap's augmented reality (AR) smart glasses. The company's five previous developer-exclusive AR glasses will be succeeded by a commercial version. The upcoming Snap Specs will feature machine learning capabilities, AI assistance, and allow users to share games with friends, and is expected to integrate directly with the Snapchat app.
title: Snap Specs to Launch in 2026 as Competitor to Meta's AI Smart Glasses

description: Threads will soon let you send DMs to other users, as per a company official. The Meta-owned company is testing the feature and it is reported to be introduced in select markets this week. Instagram head Adam Mosseri stated that the ability to send messages directly on Threads has been a “top request” since the platform was launched.
title: Threads Begins Testing the Ability to Send DMs Without Switching to Instagram

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.81 percent in the past 24 hours. While Bitcoin and Ether saw slight movements, both continued to trade at elevated levels. On Wednesday, June 11, altcoins such as Monero, Litecoin, and Shiba Inu recorded gains. In contrast, Ripple, Solana, and Dogecoin experienced price dips, with Ripple and Dogecoin ending the day in the red.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Hovers Near $110,000 as Most Altcoins See Gains

description: Gemini in Google Docs is now coming to Android devices. This new expansion will enable eligible users to take advantage of the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot while summarising a long document or asking specific questions about the content. Notably, the feature is currently only available to paid Workspace account holders.
title: Google Expands Gemini in Google Docs to Android Devices, Available in Over 20 Languages

description: Starlink is expected to introduce its satellite communication services in India soon. Ahead of the anticipated launch, a report has shed light on its expected pricing. It may price the Standard kit, which is required for setup, at Rs. 33,000. Meanwhile, its unlimited data plans may be priced between Rs. 3,000 and Rs. 4,200 per month in India.
title: Starlink to Launch in India With Rs. 33,000 Setup Kit, Unlimited Data Plans Starting at Rs. 3,000: Report

description: Google's new Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 update brings an enhanced Android desktop experience with support for connected displays. Users can choose to set up different desktops across external screens when a desktop windowing enabled device is connected. It also brings improvements related to window tiling, multi-instance management, and more.
title: Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 Update With Support for Connected Displays, Flexible Window Tiling Released

description: Google's June 2025 Pixel Feature Drop is now rolling out alongside the Android 16 update for Pixel smartphones. This update introduces a new Pixel VIPs widget for easy contact access and enables AI sticker generation directly within Gboard. Pixel camera app users will receive hints on feature usage, while existing exclusive Pixel features are expanding to more regions.
title: Google's June 2025 Pixel Drop Brings AI Sticker Generation to Gboard, Pixel VIPs Widget and Camera Hints

description: Nintendo Switch has sold over 3.5 million units globally in four days following its launch on June 5. The hybrid console has set a new record, becoming Nintendo's fastest-selling hardware ever.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Sets Record, Sells Over 3.5 Million Units in First Four Days of Launch

description: OpenAI has finally introduced the o3-pro AI model for its paid subscribers. The model, which is said to be more capable than its non-pro version, is also capable of tool use such as web search and memory. Currently, o3-pro is only available to the ChatGPT Pro subscribers. Developers can also access the model via application programming interfaces (APIs).
title: OpenAI Releases o3-Pro Reasoning-Focused AI Model, Comes With Improved Capabilities and Tool Use

description: Vivo T4 Ultra was launched in India on Wednesday with a triple rear camera unit, including a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter. The phone is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC and a 5,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging support. It comes with a 1.5K quad-curved AMOLED display with up to 5,000 nits local peak brightness level and an in-display optical fingerprint sensor for security.
title: Vivo T4 Ultra With MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ SoC, 50-Megapixel Periscope Camera Launched in India

description: Google on Tuesday released the first stable version of Android 16, beginning with supported Pixel devices. The company says it is the earliest release of a major Android operating system (OS) update in the last few years and brings several new features. It adds live updates for real-time notifications and enhanced security measures courtesy of Advanced Protection. The company says future Android 16 updates will also carry a new design language dubbed Material 3 Expressive, as well a desktop-like experience on tablets and other devices with large screens.
title: Android 16 With Support for Live Activities, Advanced Protection Rolling Out for Pixel Devices

description: Astronomers using the ASKAP telescope have discovered 15 Giant Radio Galaxies, including one stretching 12.4 million light-years. These vast structures offer new clues about black hole life cycles and jet activity. The unprecedented detail of ASKAP’s deep-sky imaging reveals both ancient and recent radio lobes, opening a new chapter in understanding galactic evolution and cosmic-scale phenomena.
title: ASKAP Telescope Discovers 15 Massive Giant Radio Galaxies, Largest Objects in the Known Universe

description: While conducting microgravity experiments and preparing for the Ax-4 crew, ISS astronauts documented massive wildfire smoke clouds drifting over Canada and the U.S., highlighting the station’s role in monitoring Earth-based environmental events from orbit. The smoke, seen from space, resulted from wildfires that triggered evacuations and impacted air quality across several North American regions
title: Astronauts Track Massive Dust Clouds over Canada and the US from ISS in June 2025

description: Gold coins from Colombia’s San José shipwreck show castles, lions, and unique crosses tied to the Lima mint in 1707. The find confirms the ship’s identity and offers rare insight into Spanish colonial wealth. Amid ownership disputes with Spain, Colombia hopes to preserve artifacts in a national museum showcasing the world’s most valuable shipwreck discovery.
title: Gold Coins from ‘World’s Richest Shipwreck’ Show 300-Year-Old Castles and Crosses

description: Itel Zeno 5G comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 5,000mAh battery, and an IP54 rating for dust and splash resistance. It has a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS screen with Panda MN228 glass protection. The handset is equipped with a 50-megapixel main camera, an 8-megapixel selfie shooter, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for security. It supports Aivana, the company's AI Voice Assistant.
title: Itel Zeno 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Launched in India

description: A recent study, backed by NASA, reveals that solar storms are causing Starlink satellites to reenter Earth's atmosphere much faster than anticipated. Analysing data from hundreds of Starlink deorbit events between 2020 and 2024, researchers found that heightened geomagnetic activity drastically increases atmospheric drag, leading to quicker orbital decay.
title: NASA Study Confirms Solar Storms Prematurely Ended Starlink Satellite's Lifespan

description: OnePlus Nord 5 and the OnePlus Nord CE 5 could be launched soon, according to a tipster. The handsets are expected to make their debut on July 8. Reports suggest that the OnePlus Nord 5 could come with a Dimensity 9400e chipset, while the latter may get the Dimensity 8350 SoC. Both purported handsets are reported to sport flat OLED screens.
title: OnePlus Nord 5, OnePlus Nord CE 5 Launch Date Leaked: Expected Specifications

description: NASA's Parker Solar Probe has made a groundbreaking discovery, observing an unprecedented plasma explosion in the Sun's corona. This rare event produced a sunward jet of particles, with protons accelerated to nearly 1,000 times the expected energy. Scientists traced this phenomenon back to a magnetic reconnection site, where twisted solar magnetic field lines explosively realign.
title: Parker Solar Probe Witnesses Unprecedented Sunward Plasma Jet Driven by Magnetic Reconnection
